title: The Well of Loneliness
description: Stephen Gordon (named by a father desperate for a son) is not like other she hunts, she fences, she reads books, wears trousers, and longs to cut her hair. As she grows up amidst the stifling grandeur of Morton Hall, the locals begin to draw away from her, aware of some indefinable thing that sets her apart. And when Stephen Gordon reaches maturity, she falls passionately in love - with another woman.
author: Radclyffe Hall
